item.title: A Long Ride from Hell
item.description: A Long Ride from Hell, in the original Italian known as Vivo per la tua morte, is a 1968 film directed by Camillo Bazzoni. It is based on the novel Judas Gun by Gordon D. Shirreffs. The film was bodybuilder Steve Reeves' final film prior to his retirement. Reeves, who turned down the lead of A Fistful of Dollars financed and co-wrote the film himself upon seeing the successful box office returns of the Clint Eastwood spaghetti westerns at the time. The film did poorly and Reeves retired from filmmaking that year.

item.title: Wanted
item.description: Wanted is an Italian western film released in 1967. It was directed by Giorgio Ferroni and starring Giuliano Gemma, Teresa Gimpera, and Nello Pazzafini. Gemma made two more westerns directed by Ferroni, with similar plots, where his character likewise carried the first name "Gary".

item.title: God Made Them... I Kill Them
item.description: God Made Them... I Kill Them is a 1968 Italian Spaghetti Western film written by Fernando Di Leo and directed by Paolo Bianchini.

item.title: May God Forgive You... But I Won't
item.description: May God Forgive You... But I Won't is a 1968 Italian Spaghetti Western film written and directed by Vincenzo Musolino.

item.title: Time of Vultures
item.description: Il tempo degli avvoltoi is a 1967 Italian Spaghetti Western film directed by Nando Cicero.

item.title: Perché uccidi ancora
item.description: Perché uccidi ancora is a 1965 Italian western film adventure directed by José Antonio de la Loma and Edoardo Mulargia.

item.title: A Sky Full of Stars for a Roof
item.description: A Sky Full of Stars for a Roof is a 1968 Italian Spaghetti Western comedy film.

item.title: Gli uomini dal passo pesante
item.description: The Tramplers is a 1965 Italian Spaghetti Western film directed by Albert Band and Mario Sequi based on the novel Guns of North Texas by Will Cook.

item.title: The Ruthless Four
item.description: The Ruthless Four is a 1968 Western film directed by Giorgio Capitani and starring Van Heflin.

item.title: Un dollaro tra i denti
item.description: A Stranger in Town, released in the UK as For a Dollar in the Teeth, is a 1967 Italian-American Spaghetti Western film directed by Luigi Vanzi.
